Vice-president of Presidium of DPRK SPA Meets Lao Delegation 
    Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and had a conversation in a friendly atmosphere with the visiting delegation of the Lao Ministry of Information and Culture led by Vice-Minister Kheckeo Soisaya at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 Present there were Kim Pyong Ho, deputy director general of the Korean Central News Agency, who is also vice-chairman of the DPRK Information Committee, and Manith Sengsathith, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Lao embassy in Pyongyang.

articles.content:
FM Meets Italian and Nepalese Ambassadors 
    Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun on Sept. 25 separately met and conversed with new Italian Ambassador Gabriele Menegatti and new Nepalese Ambassador Narendra Raj Panday to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
Upholding Banner of Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace 
    Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Jalaleddin Namini Mianji, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and embassy officials visited the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Sept. 25 on the anniversary of the signing of the agreement on cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Iranian governments.
 They looked round the computer circle room, the accordion circle room, the calligraphy circle room and other circle rooms of the palace which has been splendidly built up as a seat of extra-mural education of schoolchildren, and appreciated a performance given by art circle members of the palace.
